Name: Andromeda Survivors
About the game: Defeat thousands of enemies that are invading Andromeda! Andromeda Survivors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where you collect skills and upgrades for your ship to create amazing builds! ▪ㅤWhen an enemy is killed, it drops experience which is used to get skills for your ship thus becoming the most powerful in Andromeda! ▪ㅤProve yourself worthy of new skills and ships by completing the available missions! ▪ㅤBecome even stronger by making upgrades to your ship and skills!
Meta Title: Andromeda Survivors: Oct 14, 2022, DevDumb and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Andromeda Survivors? Check out the release date (Oct 14, 2022), developer insights from DevDumb, and a complete game summary.
